mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (iboard, bcode, iuser, title, content, group_idx) VALUES ((SELECT NEXTVAL(iboard_seq)),#{bcode},#{iuser},#{title},#{content},(SELECT LASTVAL(iboard_seq)))
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.unm as writer FROM t_board as A LEFT JOIN t_user as B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.bcode = #{bcode} ORDER BY A.group_idx desc, A.group_ord asc
